name: Jumping Over It With Neko Girl
name_original: Jumping Over It With Neko Girl
description:
Jumping Over It With Neko Girl is a Pixel platformer that doesn't forgive mistakes. You have only one way-up! Evaluate your every step, every jump, because any wrong action can be fatal. The higher you go, the longer you will have to fall. Destroy dangerous enemies, enjoy a variety of landscapes drawn in the style of pixel art, and jump! Jump to reach the top.

Key Features


  • Simple and convenient operation, it all depends on your skills
  • Five types of dangerous enemies and a boss battle
  • Various locations and dynamic music
  • And cute Neko Girl!!!
